channel.title: Version 6.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 6.2.0 (2024-08-26) Enhancements [feature][change] anchor: add opt'n t' scroll into view #886 [feature] theme: support fer GitHub styled alerts #885 Fixes [bug] arrownav: avoid rude event handl'n fer form elements #887 Maintenance [task] 404: move styles t' separate file #889
